TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileWebResponse extends System.Net.WebResponse implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

Docs.summary: Provides a file system implementation of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The FileWebResponse class implements the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>`abstract` base class to return file system resources for the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> class.
Client applications do not create FileWebResponse instances directly; instead, they are created by calling the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method on a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> instance.
The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream> instance that provides read-only access to a file system resource.
The FileWebResponse class relies on the <xref:System.IO.File> class for error handling and code access security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Close method cleans up the resources used by a <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> and closes the response stream by calling the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
> [!NOTE] > The response stream must be closed to avoid running out of system resources. You can closes the response stream by calling either <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or Close
## Examples The following example uses the Close method to close the response stream.
[!code-cpp[FileWebResponse_Close#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.net.filewebresp_0_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[FileWebResponse_Close#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.net.filewebresp_0_1.cs)] [!code-vb[FileWebResponse_Close#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.net.filewebresp_0_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the length of the content in the file system resource.
Docs.value: The number of bytes returned from the file system resource.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ContentLength property contains the length, in bytes, of the file system resource.
## Examples The following example uses the ContentLength property to obtain the content length of the file system resource.
[!code-cpp[FileWebResponse_ContentLength_ContentType#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.net.filewebresp_2_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[FileWebResponse_ContentLength_ContentType#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.net.filewebresp_2_1.cs)] [!code-vb[FileWebResponse_ContentLength_ContentType#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.net.filewebresp_2_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the content type of the file system resource.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ContentType property contains the content type of the file system resource. The value of ContentType is always "binary/octet-stream".
## Examples The following example uses the ContentType property to obtain the content type of the file system resource.
[!code-cpp[FileWebResponse_ContentLength_ContentType#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.net.filewebresp_0_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[FileWebResponse_ContentLength_ContentType#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.net.filewebresp_0_1.cs)] [!code-vb[FileWebResponse_ContentLength_ContentType#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.net.filewebresp_0_1.vb)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Any objects included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IO.Stream GetResponseStream() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the data stream from the file system resource.
Docs.returns: A for reading data from the file system resource.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The GetResponseStream method returns the data stream from the file system resource.
> [!NOTE] > The response stream must be closed to avoid running out of system resources. The response stream can be closed by calling <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A>
## Examples The following example uses the GetResponseStream method to return the data stream from the file system resource.
[!code-cpp[FileWebResponse_GetResponseStream#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.net.filewebresp_1_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[FileWebResponse_GetResponseStream#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.net.filewebresp_1_1.cs)] [!code-vb[FileWebResponse_GetResponseStream#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.net.filewebresp_1_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of header name/value pairs associated with the response.
Docs.value: A that contains the header name/value pairs associated with the response.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Headers property contains two name/value pairs, one for content length and one for content type, both of which are also exposed as properties, <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A>.
## Examples The following example uses the Headers property to retrieve the name/value pairs associated with the response.
[!code-vb[FileWebResponse_Headers#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.net.filewebresp_1_1.vb)] [!code-cs[FileWebResponse_Headers#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.net.filewebresp_1_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[FileWebResponse_Headers#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.net.filewebresp_1_1.cpp)]

Docs.summary: Gets the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
Docs.value: A that contains the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ResponseUri property contains the URI of the file system resource that provided the response. This is always the file system resource that was requested.
## Examples The following example uses the ResponseUri to retrieve the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
[!code-cs[FileWebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.net.filewebresp_3_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[FileWebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.net.filewebresp_3_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[FileWebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.net.filewebresp_3_1.vb)]

Docs.value:
Returns .
true if the property is supported by the instance; otherwise, false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is always true for [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/net-v45-md.md)].
